events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it doesn't fit me at all and I would like to request a refund.
Customer issue has been identified as a refund request due to size dissatisfaction.
Assigning the case to the Refund department for further handling.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the jacket purchase.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund to process your request efficiently?
Sure, my order number is 452789 and the jacket is too small. I'd like to return it and get my money back.
Thanks for the information. I have initiated the refund process and sent you a prepaid return label by email to send the jacket back.
Thank you, I received the return label and will ship the jacket back today. I appreciate the quick assistance.
The returned jacket has been received and your refund processed. You should see the amount credited to your account shortly.
We just wanted to check in and make sure the refund process went smoothly and if you need any further assistance.
Since there have been no further issues reported, we are closing your refund case. Thank you for contacting us.
